content.text: Dr. José Rizal: A National Hero
Welcome to the Rizal Wiki, a digital space dedicated to preserving the life, works, and legacy of Dr. José Rizal, the Philippines’ foremost national hero.
Use the navigation menu to explore key aspects of Rizal’s life and legacy:

items: Biography: Major events and milestones in Rizal’s life- Works: Summaries and excerpts from his novels, essays, and letters
Timeline: Historical events during his lifetime
Trivia: Little-known facts to make learning fun

content.text: Rizal’s ideas on freedom, education, and national identity remain relevant to this day. Understanding him helps us better understand our history and the values we carry forward.
